function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unequal distribution of urban green infrastructure","Impact":"Increased risk of physical and mental health issues in areas with limited access to green spaces","Mitigation":"Implement policies for fair distribution of green infrastructure and increase accessibility to urban green spaces","Technologies":"GIS mapping for identifying areas with limited green infrastructure, urban planning and design tools for creating accessible green spaces","People":"Urban population, especially those in areas with limited access to green spaces","Owner":"Urban planners, policymakers, local government"},{"Description":"Inequalities triggered by natural conditions and human actions","Impact":"Exacerbates social inequalities and health disparities based on environmental factors","Mitigation":"Implement measures to address environmental injustices, such as pollution control and equitable distribution of environmental resources","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technologies, pollution control technologies, sustainable urban development tools","People":"Communities affected by environmental inequalities","Owner":"Environmental agencies, local government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Procedural issues in planning, participation, and decision-making processes","Impact":"Inadequate consideration of diverse population groups' needs, leading to unequal access to urban green infrastructure","Mitigation":"Implement inclusive and participatory decision-making processes in urban planning, ensuring representation of all stakeholder groups","Technologies":"Online public engagement platforms, participatory GIS for community input, decision-making support tools","People":"Diverse population groups in urban areas","Owner":"Urban planners, policymakers, community leaders"}]}
